name: ReapersTCG
description:
We are currently looking for early adopters to try out our game. Get a chance to contribute to this new Trading Card Game. Earn Alpha season packs and cards in the process! The visuals/UI are not done, but the game core and blockchain are operational.

Reapers is a blockchain online trading card game in which you can challenge, collect and trade with friends. Win rewards when playing games and qualify for each block giveaway. This game is similar to the popular MTGA, but using a blockchain to hold your collection.

The Alpha season items are only being minted for a limited time, so hurry up to start your collection!

More info at ReapersTCG.com
